Verses: 1 yesukiristhuvin Oozhiyakkaararaagiya Pavulum Theemoththeyum, Pilippi Pattanaththil Kiristhu Yesuvukkullaana Parisuththavaangal Anaivarukkum, Kankaanigalukkum, Udhavikkaararukkum Ezhudhugiradhaavadhu:
2 nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaalum Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinaalum Ungalukkuk Kirubaiyum Samaadhaanamum Undaavadhaaga.
3 suvisesham Ungalukku Arivikkappatta Naalmudhal Idhuvaraikkum Neengal Adharku Udanpattavargalaanapadiyaal,
4 naan Pannugira Ovvoru Vinnappaththilum Ungal Anaivarukkaagavum Eppodhum Sandhoshaththode Vinnappampanni,
5 ungalil Narkiriyaiyaith Thodanginavar Adhai Yesukiristhuvin Naalbariyandham Mudiya Nadaththivaruvaarendru Nambi,
6 naan Ungalai Ninaikkirapozhudhu En Dhevanai Sthoththirikkiren.

7 en Kattugalilum, Naan Suviseshaththirkaaga Uththaravusolli Adhaith Thidappaduththivarugiradhilum, Neengal Anaivarum Enakku Alikkappatta Kirubaiyil Pangullavargalaanadhaal, Ungalai En Irudhayaththil Thariththukkondirukkirapadiyinaale, Ungalellaaraiyung Kuriththu Naan Ippadi Ninaikkiradhu Enakkuth Thagudhiyaayirukkiradhu.
8 yesukiristhuvin Urukkamaana Anbile Ungalellaarmelum Evvalavo Vaanjaiyaayirukkiren Enbadharku Dhevane Enakku Saatchi.
9 melum, Uththamamaanavaigalai Neengal Oppukkollaththakkadhaaga Ungal Anbaanadhu Arivilum Ellaa Unarvilum Innum Adhigamadhigamaaip Perugavum,
10 dhevanukku Magimaiyum Thudhiyumundaagumpadi Yesukiristhuvinaal Varugira Needhiyin Kanigalaal Niraindhavargalaagi,
11 neengal Kiristhuvin Naalukkendru Thuppuravaanavargalum Idaralatravargalumaayirukkavum Vendudhal Seygiren.
12 sagodharare, Enakku Sambaviththavaigal Suvisesham Pirabalamaagumpadikku Edhuvaayitrendru Neengal Ariya Manadhaayirukkiren.
13 aramanai Yengumullavargalukkum Matra Yaavarukkum En Kattugal Kiristhuvukkullaana Kattugalendru Veliyarangamaagi,
14 sagodhararil Anegar En Kattugalaale Karththarukkul Thidankondu Bayamillaamal Thiruvasanaththai Sollumpadi Adhigamaaith Thunindhirukkiraargal.
15 silar Poraamaiyinaalum Virodhaththinaalum, Silar Nalmanadhinaalum Kiristhuvaip Pirasangikkiraargal.
16 silar En Kattugalode Ubaththiravaththaiyunkootta Ninaiththu, Suththamanadhode Kiristhuvai Ariviyaamal, Virodhaththinaale Arivikkiraargal.
17 suviseshaththirkaaga Naan Uththaravu Solla Erpaduththappattavanendru Arindhu, Silar Anbinaale Arivikkiraargal.
18 idhanaalenna? Vanjagaththinaalaavadhu, Unmaiyinaalaavadhu, Eppadiyaavadhu, Kiristhu Arivikkappadugiraar; Adhanaal Sandhoshappadugiren, Innamum Sandhoshappaduven.
19 adhu Ungal Vendudhalinaalum Yesukiristhuvinudaiya Aaviyin Udhaviyinaalum Enakku Ratchippaaga Mudiyumendru Ariven.

20 naan Ondrilum Vetkappattuppogaamal, Eppozhudhum Pola Ippozhudhum, Migundha Dhairiyaththode Jeevanaalaagilum, Saavinaalaagilum, Kiristhu En Sareeraththinaale Magimaippaduvaarendru Enakku Undaayirukkira Vaanjaikkum Nambikkaikkum Thakkadhaai, Appadi Mudiyum.
21 kiristhu Enakku Jeevan, Saavu Enakku Aadhaayam.
22 aagilum Sareeraththil Pizhaiththirukkiradhinaale En Kiriyaikkup Balanundaayiruppadhaal, Naan Therindhukollavendiyadhu Innadhendru Ariyen.
23 enenil Ivvirandinaalum Naan Nerukkappadugiren, Dhegaththaivittuppirindhu, Kiristhuvudanekooda Irukka Enakku Aasaiyundu, Adhu Adhiga Nanmaiyaayirukkum;
24 appadiyirundhum, Naan Sareeraththil Thariththiruppadhu Ungalukku Adhiga Avasiyam.
25 indha Nichchayaththaikkondirundhu, Naan Marupadiyum Ungalidaththil Varugiradhinaal Ennaikkuriththu Ungaludaiya Magizhchchi Kiristhu Yesuvukkul Perugumpadikku,
26 ungal Visuvaasaththin Varththanaikkaagavum Sandhoshaththukkaagavum Naan Pizhaiththu, Ungal Anaivarodunkooda Iruppenendru Arindhirukkiren.

27 naan Vandhu Ungalaik Kandaalum, Naan Varaamalirundhaalum, Neengal Ore Aaviyile Urudhiyaai Nindru, Ore Aaththumaavinaale Suviseshaththin Visuvaasaththirkaagak Koodapporaadi, Edhirkkiravargalaal Ondrilum Marulaadhirukkireergalendru Ungalaikkuriththu Naan Kelvippadumpadi, Evvidhaththilum Neengal Kiristhuvin Suviseshaththirkup Paaththiraraaga Maaththiram Nadandhukollungal.
28 neengal Marulaadhirukkiradhu Avargal Kettuppogiradharkum, Neengal Ratchikkappadugiradharkum Aththaatchiyaayirukkiradhu; Idhuvum Dhevanudaiya Seyale.
29 enenil Kiristhuvinidaththil Visuvaasikkiradharkumaaththiramalla, Avarnimiththamaagap Paadupadugiradharkum Ungalukku Arulappattirukkiradhu.
30 neengal Ennidaththile Kandadhum Enakku Undendru Ippozhudhu Kelvippadugiradhumaana Poraattame Ungalukkum Undu.
